abstractText: Entrenchment is a measure of the vertical confinementof the stream.Entrenchment will be determined at all sites with less than 30 m in average bankfull width (average calculated during site determination; Table 4), and are less than 4% gradient (determined at end of the laser survey). Therefore, this task is one of the last tasks completed at a site.
title: Channel Morphology: Entrenchment v1.0
